#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

typedef long long int ll;
ll t,num,temp;

long long int power(int k)
     {
     	long long int i,s=1;
	      for(i=1;i<=k;i++)
	      	s=s*2;
      
      return s;
	}

int main(int argc, char const *argv[])
{
  ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
  // freopen("in.txt", "r" , stdin);
  // freopen("out.txt" , "w" , stdout);

  cin>>t;

	 while(t--)
	 {
	 	cin>>num;
	 	temp = log(num)/log(2);
	 	cout<<power(temp)<<endl;
	 }
  
	return 0;
}
